评论详情: Fits true to size Soft and durable fits great. I bought 2 pairs and I'm completely satisfied with them

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: These are nice leggings with good compression for sporty activities. The side pockets fit my iPhone. I did have issues with the waist rolling a little during some yoga exercises, but for the most part everything stays in place. The construction of the pants is flattering. I really like these. I have machine washed in cold water with a low tumble dry without issue.
Nice leggings.  Comfortable and love the pockets.  Would definitely buy again.

These soft leggings are stretchy and very comfortable.  The high waist with compression material actually makes my belly look a little smaller.  They work perfectly in the gym as they were very flexible in all my workouts.  They stayed at the ankles and didn’t inch up my legs.  The side pockets are fairly small, but I can fit my iPhone in it.  I washed these in cold water and hung to dry.  There was no shrinkage and they remained their shape.  I used their sizing chart and they are true to size.  Overall, I think these are quality leggings that are perfect for everyday activities.
Comfy and warm. Fit is good. Fabric is good quality.

This is my first pair of Yitty leggings and honestly I was skeptical about the hype, but my goodness I LOVE them. First of all, and most important as a mother of 4, there is no annoying tight waistband at the top to squeeze your stomach. They are stretchy and comfortable and stay up all day. You can do deep squats without anything being see-through (at least in the color I got). They are smooth and great quality. Overall I totally recommend for workouts or even just lounging.
These leggings are so comfy and I was surprised at the design, they look like the expensive brand ones

评论概述: Shaping/tight on waist which is not to my liking
类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Deep Navy
评论详情: Overall I really like these leggings. The fabric is really smooth and comfortable, and it's a medium thickness, and seems really high quality. I washed these leggings in warm water and dried on medium heat and they did well - no shrinking.  I got these in large and while they fit TTS they are definitely a "shaping" type of legging so they are a little bit tight on my waist. For me, personally, I just hate having things be tight on my waist. I have an apple body shape and have a round belly, so these aren't the most comfortable for me there. I am 5'4" and about 150 lbs. I usually get a large in leggings to try to make things be slightly looser on the waist, but I guess in these I should have gone to an XL even though they fit well everywhere else.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: We received the size large. It looks and fits like a size medium. I would recommend buying a size bigger than you normally wear.  * Has nice big pockets that should have no problems holding most phones. * Material is lightweight, stretchy, smooth, and silky feeling. * The body is made out of 82% Polyester and 18% Elastane. The mesh lining is 79% Nylon and 21% Elastane. * Machine washable.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: They are true to size and don’t roll down much. The pockets are large enough to fit my 16pro max comfortably.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: I ran in these today. Although they feel thin, they kept me warm on a 40 degree day. They are comfortable, washed/dried well and easily. They are very soft, not at all stiff. I think they will be some of my favorite leggings!

Love these leggings.  They are super comfy and the color is lovely.  They move well and breath but are still thick enough to pass the squat test.  The pocket is a good size too--big enough for a phone.

These are comfortable with a soft suedelike feel to them, true black color, fit true to size and are great for wearing as daily leggings or for workouts. The pocket is handy for phone and they launder well. Would recommend!

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: I got these leggings and I LOVE them. They are the perfect ratio of cozy and compressive. AND squat proof at the rack. The pockets aren't massive either. I will say, the waist band DID roll a little, but I do have a belly after having two kiddos. I am 5'10, 205 pounds, athletic build. I got a size Large and they were perfect!

I'm plus sized and post partum, so clothes that fit well are not easy to find. I'm just moving out of my maternity clothes and found these leggings. Quality is great, they're squat proof and super soft + fit my body well!
I like these green stretch pants. They fit to size and are comfortable. I like how they have pockets for your phone while working out. They are a little thin but otherwise I love them.

评论概述: Very soft and a good fit

评论详情: I love the way these leggings feel! They're a good thickness so I can use them for running or yoga without feeling self-conscious. They fit really well, too. The size chart is accurate. They are long, so they come right to my ankles, which I don't always like, but they're snug and don't ride up, so they'll keep my ankles warm in the winter for sure.

评论详情: These leggings are very well made. They are thick and sturdy. You can’t see through the fabric and it is definitely well constructed. I got these for my daughter. She wears them to the gym and they’re nice enough for her to wear these out running errands. She likes that her cellphone fits perfectly in the pocket. A bargain for these quality leggings.

These are comfy and not see-through however they do run on the bigger side

评论概述: Active Women's Ultraluxe High-Waist Pocket Legging, Athleisure, 4-Way-Stretch
评论详情: I was pleasantly surprised by these. I have a similar style pair that is grey and expected them to be similarly built but they aren't. These are made from a much softer, stretchier, and more breathable. Another thing that makes this pair better than the one I have is the comfortability of the scrunch area. My other pair tends to ride up and sit too tightly in the back but these are super comfortable in that area. It also has a pocket in the back that would fit a phone. Overall a great pair of yoga pants!
